name: Cortado
ingredients:
1 shot of espresso
1 oz. of warm milk
1 cm of foam
Into a 5 oz rocks glass

name: Ristretto
ingredients: 1 shot of espresso into a 2-4 oz. espresso cup, however use half the amount of water as a regular espresso

name: Latte
ingredients:
1 shot of espresso
8-10 oz. of steamed milk
1 cm of foam
Into a 6-9 oz. coffee mug

name: Cappuccino
ingredients:
1-2 shots of espresso
2 oz. of steamed milk
2 oz. of foamed milk
Into a 6-8 oz. cappuccino mug

name: Macchiatto
ingredients:
1-2 tsp. of steamed milk
1 shot of espresso

name: Mocha
ingredients:
1 shot of espresso
1-2 oz. of chocolate syrup
1-3 oz. of steamed milk
2-3 cm of foam or whipped cream
In a 6-8 oz. mug

name: Americano
ingredients:
1 shot of espresso
3 oz. of hot water
5-6 oz. coffee mug

name: Flat White
ingredients:
1 shot of espresso
4 oz. of steamed milk
In a 6 oz. tumbler

name: Frappuccino
ingredients:
2 cups of ice
1 cup coffee
1 cup milk
Blend in blender
In a 16 oz. glass
